module.name: physical_unit_3d_design_view
module.keywords: module, component shape, component location, three dimensional, electrical, electronic, design

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of information that describes the three dimensional shape of a component and that describes the three dimensional location of a component where the product context is a physical design view. The shape of the component is provided only for the cases where the shape of the component is not available as a property of the definition of the component.

inscope.li: items within the scope of application module Layered 3d shape, ISO/TS 10303-1694;
items within the scope of application module Part template shape with parameters, ISO/TS 10303-1720;
items within the scope of application module Physical unit design view, ISO/TS 10303-1728;
items within the scope of application module Solid model, ISO/TS 10303-1793.
